overview: The boys have usually got an apple to sweeten their teacher up in an effort to gain some better grades, but one savvy pupil knows that if he gets his handsome maths teacher to Try My Lollipop, amongst other things, he'll be set for the rest of term. But it's not only the teachers that have their eyes firmly on those lollipops, fellow classmates can be just as greedy and once the sweet sticks are offered up, they can't resist the lure and are soon wrapping their lips around the hard pole before enclosing their ass cheeks around the same pole. Ten horny high school twinks satiate their hankering for sweet meat.

production_companies.name: Orrange Media Group: Horny Highschool Twinks

title: Try My Lollipop
